short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cute images for you when you are sad

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In life, horrible things happen outside of our control. We might give into the negative emotions. This extension helps you to lighten the mood whenever you're caught in a bad mood. Using sentiment analysis, when negative sentiment is picked from the words you type, the browser will show you a cute cat that you can't resist, but go, "Aw~"
